title: How this brave dog became the first animal in space and made history
description: Laika, a stray dog from Moscow, became the first living creature to orbit Earth aboard Sputnik 2 in 1957. Her one-way mission, intended to gather data on life in space, tragically ended within hours due to overheating. Despite her sacrifice, the vital information gathered paved the way for future human space missions.

description: UP Board timetable 2026 for Class 10 and 12 has been released by the Uttar Pradesh Madhyamik Shiksha Parishad (UPMSP). The matric and intermediate exams will begin from February 18 and continue till March 12, 2026, with morning and afternoon shifts. Students can download the complete datesheet from the official UPMSP website. The schedule includes theory and practical exams for all streams, including Science, Commerce, Arts, Vocational subjects, and languages, along with detailed day-wise and subject-wise timings.

title: 'Easier to travel to Dubai': Lack of trains derails voting plans of Bihari migrants
description: Migrant labourers from Bihar in Hyderabad face difficulties voting in state assembly elections due to a severe shortage of trains. High ticket prices and limited availability prevent many from returning home, despite their desire to participate in the electoral process for better opportunities.

title: 'Used pillow to muffle cries': Desperate for money, mason, wife kill 65-yr-old
description: A mason and his wife, facing financial hardship, murdered their 65-year-old landlady in Bengaluru to steal her 30gm mangalsutra. The couple, who had rented the ground floor six months prior, confessed to strangling the woman after posing as potential TV buyers. Police arrested them within a day, their suspicious behavior and a missing pillow aiding the investigation.

Password for Louvre’s security system was ‘LOUVRE’ — and social media can’t stop laughing
description: A recent security audit of the Louvre has exposed alarming cybersecurity lapses, including a video surveillance system password of "LOUVRE." This revelation follows a brazen daylight heist of crown jewels. Reports indicate the museum has long suffered from major IT vulnerabilities, with outdated systems and weak credentials, raising serious concerns about the protection of priceless cultural heritage.

description: Philadelphia Eagles running back Saquon Barkley's availability for the Week 10 Monday Night Football game against the Green Bay Packers is uncertain. The tech giant is also strengthening its pre-contract review for sensitive projects, emphasizing human rights due diligence.

Gujarat riots: 'Hard videographic proof' vanishes; court acquits 3 accused
description: An Ahmedabad court acquitted three men accused in the 2002 riots, citing a lack of evidence. The videographer who claimed to have captured them with firearms, including an AK-47, recanted his statement and the crucial tape vanished. Many witnesses also turned hostile during the 23-year trial, leading to the acquittal.

He highlighted that while cleverness is a gift, kindness is a deliberate choice. Bezos emphasised that opportunities require courageous action, and a life's meaning is ultimately shaped by the decisions made, not just abilities possessed.

title: Delhi’s ‘Money Heist’: How ‘Professor’, ‘Berlin’ and ‘Amanda’ duped 200 people of Rs 50 cr
description: Police have busted a gang that staged a real-life Money Heist. The criminals, using aliases from the popular TV series, defrauded 200 people of Rs 50 crore. They operated a fake online trading scheme, promising high returns. The operation was uncovered after a victim reported a Rs 22 lakh loss. Three key members have been arrested.

description: Prince Harry reportedly feels uncomfortable with Meghan Markle's recent Instagram posts, which he believes are 'parading him around' and linking her new brand to their royal past. Sources suggest Harry dislikes how Meghan leverages their royal history for her lifestyle brand, citing a candle named after their wedding date and her use of royal initials.

title: Celina Jaitly urges govt to help free brother Major Vikrant Jaitly detained in UAE
description: Actor Celina Jaitly has expressed deep gratitude after the Delhi High Court issued a notice to the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) in connection with her brother, Major (Retd.) Vikrant Kumar Jaitly, who has been detained in the UAE since 2024. Celina has now made an emotional appeal to the Government of India to help bring her brother back home.

title: Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife MacKenzie Scott makes large donation; focus on education
description: MacKenzie Scott has gifted Howard University $80 million, one of the largest single donations in its history, to support general operations and its College of Medicine. This significant contribution arrives as the university faces delays in federal funding due to a government shutdown. The donation continues Scott's recent pattern of substantial gifts to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.

title: Lakers legend praises Bronny James after strong game vs Trail Blazers
description: Bronny James showcased a standout performance for the Los Angeles Lakers against the Portland Trail Blazers, contributing five points and six assists. Lakers legend James Worthy lauded the young guard's game, calling it potentially his best yet. Coach JJ Redick also praised Bronny's defensive intensity and physicality, highlighting his significant contributions in a crucial fourth-quarter stretch.

title: Who is Brian Schottenheimer’s wife? Inside Cowboys coach’s life and marriage
description: Gemmi Schottenheimer has been a steadfast support for her husband, NFL coach Brian Schottenheimer, navigating the unpredictable world of professional football. Her resilience and quiet strength have been crucial through career highs and lows, including team changes and personal family challenges. Gemmi's unwavering presence has been a constant, shaping Brian's journey and their family's life.
